title: Navigate forwards into a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Top' link.

title: Navigate backwards into a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Bottom' link.

title: Navigate forwards out of a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Bottom' link, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.

title: Navigate backwards out of a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Top' link, navigate to the 'Navigate forwards from here' link.

title: Navigate forwards to a text input inside a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Name' text input.
assertions: roleForm nameAddContact roleGroup nameGroupAddContact nameInputName theAbilityToEnterTextIntoInput

title: Navigate backwards to a text input inside a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Phone' text input.
assertions: roleForm nameAddContact roleGroup nameGroupAddContact nameInputPhone theAbilityToEnterTextIntoInput

title: Navigate forwards to a button inside a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Add contact' button.
assertions: roleForm nameAddContact roleGroup nameGroupAddContact roleButton nameButtonAddContact

title: Navigate backwards to a button inside a form landmark in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Add contact' button.
assertions: roleForm nameAddContact roleGroup nameGroupAddContact roleButton nameButtonAddContact
